parameters.definition: Capacity of the tractor for carrying corn
Capacity of the car for carrying corn
Minimum ratio of number of cars used to number of tractors used
Minimum amount of corn to be sent to the city

description: A corn farmer sends his corn to the city by either tractor or car. A tractor can carry \param{Tc} kg of corn while a car can carry \param{Cc} kg of corn. Since tractors are very slow, the number of cars used has to be at least \param{Ratio} times the number of tractors used. If at least \param{MinCorn} kg of corn need to be sent to the city, minimize the total number of tractors and cars needed.
